nodes.text: The Brig Stompers were a group of non-human mercenaries active during the Galactic War. They have gained notoriety after wiping out Gaftikar's entire defense force during a coup. By 3642 BBY they were stationed on Hoth, where they threatened to overrun the Sith Empire's Thesh Outpost. To prevent that from happening, Sergeant Kavsun hired an individual to thin out the Brig Stompers while destroying their supplies.
